pluggable.name: Mzingi 2
pluggable.author: Michael Bishop
pluggable.description: Mzingi, Swahili for foundation, is intended as a clean, simple design that can be used as a framework for customization and theme development. Version 2 is intended to remove the fixed grid and be responsive, as well as leverage HTML5, CSS3 and have a slightly more finished look and feel.
